text: Churches in Komarivka Komarivka () - village in Berezhany Raion of Ternopil Oblast, Ukraine. ==Population== *Population in 2001: 220 inhabitants with over 64 houses. ==References== ==Sources== * ==External links== *Official data about the village * Category:Villages in Berezhany Raion
title: Komarivka, Berezhany Raion
